mapper.insert:
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into shop (shelf_qualification_img,shop_logo_img,shop_level,shop_rank,shop_licenes,shop_address,user_id,work_to,shop_licenes_img,shelf_qualification_desc,shop_status,create_time,work_from,shop_qualifies,shop_description,shop_licenes_desc,shop_img,shop_title,shop_phone,shop_qq,failed_reason) values (#{shelfQualificationImg},#{shopLogoImg},#{shopLevel},#{shopRank},#{shopLicenes},#{shopAddress},#{userId},#{workTo},#{shopLicenesImg},#{shelfQualificationDesc},#{shopStatus},#{createTime},#{workFrom},#{shopQualifies},#{shopDescription},#{shopLicenesDesc},#{shopImg},#{shopTitle},#{shopPhone},#{shopQq},#{failedReason})
mapper.update:
UPDATE shop
shelf_qualification_img=#{shelfQualificationImg},
shop_logo_img=#{shopLogoImg},
shop_level=#{shopLevel},
shop_rank=#{shopRank},
shop_licenes=#{shopLicenes},
shop_address=#{shopAddress},
user_id=#{userId},
work_to=#{workTo},
shop_licenes_img=#{shopLicenesImg},
shelf_qualification_desc=#{shelfQualificationDesc},
shop_status=#{shopStatus},
create_time=#{createTime},
work_from=#{workFrom},
shop_qualifies=#{shopQualifies},
shop_description=#{shopDescription},
shop_licenes_desc=#{shopLicenesDesc},
shop_img=#{shopImg},
shop_title=#{shopTitle},
shop_phone=#{shopPhone},
shop_qq=#{shopQq},
failed_reason=#{failedReason},
WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM shop WHERE id=#{id} and user_id=#{userId}
